1:
Yahweh, listen to what I say and answer me
\q2 because I am weak and needy.
\q1
3:
Lord, act kindly toward me
\q2 because I cry out to you all during each day.
\q1
4:
Lord, cause me to be glad,
\q2 because I pray to you.
\b
\q1
7:
When I have troubles, I call out to you
\q2 because you answer me.
\b
\q1
8:
Lord, among all the gods whom the heathen nations worship,
\q2 there is no one like you;
\q1 not one of them has done the great things that you have done.
\q1
9:
Lord, someday people from all the nations that you have established will come and bow down in front of you,
\q2 and they will praise you.
\q1
10:
You are great, and you do wonderful things;
\q2 only you are God.
\b
\q1
11:
Yahweh, teach me what you want me to do
\q2 so that I may conduct my life according to what you say, all of which is right.
\q1 Cause me to have an awesome respect for you with all my inner being.
\q1
12:
Lord, my God, I will thank you with all my inner being,
\q2 and I will praise you forever.
\q1
13:
You faithfully love me very much as you have promised;
\q2 you have prevented me from dying and going to the place where dead people are.
\b
\q1
16:
Look down toward me and act mercifully to me;
\q2 cause me to be strong and save me,
\q2 the one who serves you faithfully as my mother did.
\q1
